metadata.title: CVE-2016-10730 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Amanda 3.3.1. A user with backup privileges cantrivially compromise a client installation. Amstar is an Amanda ApplicationAPI script. It should not be run by users directly. It uses star to backupand restore data. It runs binaries with root permissions when parsing thecommand line argument --star-path.

criterions.comment: amanda: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
